services.title: Front-end Development
services.description: If you need assistance with Android or web development, I can help you. I have expertise in various front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, and Android Layout. Whether you require assistance with Android app development or web development, feel free to reach out to me for support.

services.title: Microsoft Office
services.description: Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Skilled in document formatting, data analysis, presentation design, and professional reporting for academic and workplace efficiency. I can assist you with creating, editing, and formatting documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.

services.title: Sports
services.description: Actively involved in various sports activities that help me stay fit, focused, and team-oriented. I enjoy playing games like cricket, volleyball, and badminton, which have taught me the values of discipline, teamwork, and sportsmanship. I can provide guidance on sports-related topics and help you with your fitness goals.
